name: A Voice Controlled Game
description:
This is a shoot-em-up type game that is controlled only with the pitch of your voice. Other than opening the game, no input from the keyboard or mouse is necessary. 

This game is still being worked on so some features such as an exit button have not been implemented yet. (Use alt + tab or alt+f4 to close the game, or open the game in windowed mode and click the x in the corner.)

There is no audio for now because of budget cuts.
